Class MainController

java.lang.Object
controller.MainController
public class MainController extends Object
The central controller of the application, coordinating between the Model (game logic, clients, users) and the View (UI windows).

Responsibilities:

  • Handling user actions from the UI and translating them into application logic.
  • Managing game logic, bets, results, and client/game balance updates.
  • Interfacing with the database layer via DataBaseController.
  • Maintaining the current user session via Session.
  • Performing input validation through Validator.

Since:
3.0
Author:
Davitroon

  • Method Details

    • initializeClasses

      public void initializeClasses(DatabaseManager dbManager)
      Initializes essential components: Validator, DatabaseController, and ViewController.
      Parameters:
      dbManager - Database manager used to initialize the database controller.
      Since:
      3.3

    • updateBalances

      public void updateBalances(Client client, Game game, double betResult, boolean gameClosed)
      Updates the balances of a client and a game after a match and stores the session.
      Parameters:
      client - The client whose balance is to be updated.
      game - The game whose balance is to be updated.
      betResult - Amount won or lost (positive for win, negative for loss).
      gameClosed - True if the game was closed prematurely, false otherwise.
      Since:
      3.0

    • closeProgram

      public void closeProgram()
      Closes the program safely by closing the DB connection and exiting.
      Since:
      3.0

    • promptBet

      public double promptBet(Client client, Game game) throws BetException
      Prompts the client for a valid bet, with options to repeat the last bet or cancel.
      Parameters:
      client - The client making the bet.
      game - The game in which the bet is placed.
      Returns:
      The validated bet amount, or 0 if canceled.
      Throws:
      BetException - If the client or game balance is insufficient or the input is invalid.
      Since:
      3.0

    • warnCloseGame

      public boolean warnCloseGame(Client client, Game game, double bet)
      Warns the user when attempting to close a game mid-match.
      Parameters:
      client - The client playing.
      game - The game being played.
      bet - The bet amount for the match.
      Returns:
      True if the user confirms exit, false otherwise.
      Since:
      3.0

    • gameEndStatus

      public int gameEndStatus(String statusMessage)
      Displays a generic end-of-game window to prompt the user for next action.
      Parameters:
      statusMessage - Message describing the end of the match.
      Returns:
      User choice (0: Go Back, 1: Bet Again)
      Since:
      3.0

    • startBlackjack

      public void startBlackjack(Blackjack blackjack)
      Initializes a blackjack match by shuffling and dealing cards to dealer and player.
      Parameters:
      blackjack - Blackjack match object.
      Since:
      3.0

    • blackjackHit

      public boolean blackjackHit(Blackjack blackjack)
      Executes a hit action for the player.
      Parameters:
      blackjack - Blackjack object.
      Returns:
      True if the player busts, false otherwise.
      Since:
      3.0

    • blackjackStand

      public boolean blackjackStand(Blackjack blackjack, BlackjackUI window)
      Executes the stand action in Blackjack and resolves the dealer's moves.
      Parameters:
      blackjack - Blackjack object.
      window - UI window to update dealer cards.
      Returns:
      True if the client wins, false if the client loses.
      Since:
      3.0

    • blackjackEndStatus

      public String blackjackEndStatus(boolean clientWins, Client client, Blackjack blackjack, double betResult)
      Returns a formatted message with the outcome of a blackjack match.
      Parameters:
      clientWins - True if the player won.
      client - The client object.
      blackjack - Blackjack object.
      betResult - Amount won/lost.
      Returns:
      Message describing the outcome.
      Since:
      3.0

    • slotmachineEndStatus

      public String slotmachineEndStatus(Client client, Slotmachine slotmachine, double betResult)
      Returns a formatted message with the outcome of a slot machine match.
      Parameters:
      client - The client playing.
      slotmachine - Slotmachine object.
      betResult - Amount won/lost.
      Returns:
      Message describing the outcome.
      Since:
      3.0

    • fillClientTable

      public void fillClientTable(ResultSet rset, DefaultTableModel clientModel)
      Fills the client table in the Games window with a subset of client information.

      The table will contain the following columns: ID, Name, Active status, Balance.

      Parameters:
      rset - ResultSet obtained from querying the clients from the database. It is expected to have the required columns in the correct order.
      clientModel - The table model that will be filled with the client data.
      Since:
      3.0

    • fillFullClientTable

      public void fillFullClientTable(ResultSet rset, DefaultTableModel clientModel)
      Fills the client table in the Management window with full client details.

      The table will contain the following columns: ID, Name, Age, Gender, Active status, Balance.

      Parameters:
      rset - ResultSet obtained from querying the clients from the database. It is expected to have all columns required for the full client view.
      clientModel - The table model that will be filled with the client data.
      Since:
      3.0

    • fillGameTable

      public void fillGameTable(ResultSet rset, DefaultTableModel gameModel)
      Fills the game table with information about the available games.

      The table will contain the following columns: ID, Type, Active status, Money.

      Parameters:
      rset - ResultSet obtained from querying the games from the database. It is expected to have the required columns in the correct order.
      gameModel - The table model that will be filled with the game data.
      Since:
      3.0
